title: On an Island Somewhere….
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Ayumu-chan, look look. I made this, how is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Waa, so cute~~!! It’s like a picnic under the starry sky!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, yeah. Ayumu-chan, you made an outdoor pool, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe.... I saw night pools on TV and thought they were beautiful. I’m too afraid to go to them, but I can enjoy myself as much as I want here♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, that’s right. Hey, what should we do today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hmm.... What if we make a concert hall?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That sounds fun! I want to make that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>After that, I want to make clothes, and have a live with everyone<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Mhmm…. Then, we have to gather more materials….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That’s true. Alright, let’s do our best gathering materials today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’ll do it with all of my might~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
